title: Algorithmic​ Trading​ and​ Machine Learning​ by​ ​Two​ Road​ Tech.
description: IEEE-NITK​ presented​ a talk​ on​ Algorithmic​ Trading​ and​ Machine​ Learning​ by​ Two​ Roads​ Tech Solutions​ on​ 22nd​ of​ february.​ This​ gave​ insights​ on​ algorithmic​ investing​ and​ the​ applications of​ computer​ science​ concepts​ to​ the​ financial​ world.​ This​ talk​ gave​ knowledge​ on​ how​ we​ can make​ thousands​ of​ dollars​ of​ profit​ through​ arbitrage​ in​ the​ NYSE,​ the​ technology​ that​ lies behind​ high​ speed​ trading​ and​ how​ is​ it​ effectively​ used​ to​ generate​ profits​ etc.
